processingCommand.script:
IF "${ExportArchiveName}"=="" GOTO SKIPSTEP
:IMPORT
Echo on
IF "${DateOverrideFile}" EQU "" (
  ${XT_COPYFILE} from="${ExportFileName}" to="${ExportArchiveName}" ${ExportArchiveOptions}
) ELSE (
  ${XT_COPYFILE} from="${ExportFileName}" to="${ExportArchiveName}" datefile="${DateOverrideFile}" ${ExportArchiveOptions}
)
Echo Off
set retcode=%errorlevel%
echo CopyFile ended with return code: %retcode%
IF %retcode% EQU 0 GOTO NORMALFLOW
GOTO ERRORFLOW
:NORMALFLOW
set resexe=0
GOTO END
:ERRORFLOW
set resexe=1
GOTO END
:SKIPSTEP
Echo ExportArchiveName variable is not defined, step is skipped
set resexe=0
GOTO END
:END
exit %resexe%
